title: Cranberry Vinaigrette
instructions: In a bowl whisk together the syrup, the mustard, the vinegar, the cranberry juice, adding salt and pepper to your taste.  Add the oil in a stream, whisking as you do so.  Continue whisking until the salad dressing is emulsified.
Source:  The Last Touch:  Vinaigrettes, Gourmet Magazine, May 1991.
